metadata.title: CVE-2016-1866 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Salt 2015.8.x before 2015.8.4 does not properly handle clear messages onthe minion, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to execute arbitrarycode by inserting packets into the minion-master data stream.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1866` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

salt-api - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-cloud - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-common - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-master - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-minion - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-proxy - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-ssh - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-syndic - 2015.8.8+ds-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: salt package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2015.8.8+ds-1').
